scene.name: WallMarket
scene.p: Aerith and Cloud head through Sector 6 and arrive at the playground.

Aerith
The gate to Sector 7's in there.

Cloud
Thanks. I guess this is goodbye. You gonna be all right going home?

Aerith
Oh no! 'What ever will I do!?' ...isn't that what you want me to say?

Cloud
- See her home
- Take her to Sector 7

Aerith
Isn't that a little out of the way?

Cloud
Yeah, I guess so.

Aerith
I could do that. But won't I be in your way?

Cloud
What do you mean in the way?

Aerith
Nothing!

Aerith
Can we take a break?
She wanders into the playground and stops by the slide with a cat's face.
I can't believe it's still here.
She runs around and climbs up on top of it.
Cloud, over here!
Cloud shrugs and joins her.

Aerith
What rank were you?

Cloud
Rank?

Aerith
You know, in SOLDIER.

Cloud
Oh, I was...
Flash.
First Class.

Aerith
Just the same as him.

Cloud
The same as who?

Aerith
My first boyfriend.

Cloud
You were... serious?

Aerith
No. But I liked him for a while.

Cloud
I probably knew him. What was his name?

Aerith
It doesn't really matter.
The gate to Sector 7 opens, and a chocobo-drawn carriage comes out. Tifa is riding in back, wearing a revealing blue dress. Cloud jumps to his feet.

Cloud
Huh? Hey, back there......
Tifa!?
The carriage pulls past them and into Wall Market.

Aerith
That girl in the cart was Tifa? Where was she going? She looked kind of odd...
Aerith jumps off the slide and runs after the carriage.

Cloud
Wait!
I'll go on alone! You go on home!
He sighs and follows her into Wall Market.

Aerith
This place is scary in a lot of ways. Especially for a girl. So we've got to find Tifa fast.

Man outside Honey Bee Inn
I just can't make up my mind... Mmm.
Huh? About what?
Hmmm, don't make me say it... It's the shop down on the right.
On to the Honey Bee Inn, a brothel outside of which a number of guys are hanging around.

Johnny
Man... Should I go...... or not?
...I get so mental at times like this. I'm hopeless!!
Hey!! Aren't you...?
What!! You mean you're... too?

Cloud
- Yeah, me too.
- Don't bring me down to your level

Johnny
You're Tifa's childhood friend, and you brought a new girlfriend to a place like this!?
What kind of guy are you!!

p.span: Don't bring me down to your level

scene.p:
Johnny
What... Me too. I decided this after a lot of deep thought. My last memories of Midgar... you know.
But... That guy over there kinda scares me.

Punk
What the hell!! You *%^&!! This ain't no #$*&^% show!! I'm busy right now!!
I'm feelin' like there's gonna be a fight!!

Shinra Soldier
Urrrrgh... no way...... I can't go on.
Things aren't working out.
Between our differences and my pay, it just isn't cutting it.

Older Man
Welcome!! Even unpopular dweebs, like you may meet their destiny here!!
You looking for a girlfriend too?

Cloud
- You know a girl named Tifa?
- This place doesn't interest me.

p.span: You know a girl named Tifa?

scene.p:
Older Man
Hey, you're pretty fast. Tifa's our newest girl.
But, unfortunately, she's having an interview right now.
Here at the Honey Bee Inn, it's customary for all the new girls to be taken to Don Corneo's mansion.
Don Corneo's a famous dilettante. Now he wants to settle down and is in the market for a bride.

Older Man
Hmm... Seems to like it just fine. Good for you.

Redhead in Suit
The Honey Bee Inn is a private club. Only members can go in. Shoo, shoo.
Back to the main streets...

Kid by Cat Statue
Aren't cats great? This one's a little big, huh?

Punk
Hey boy! You shore got a good lookin' heifer there!
Take her to the Don's place, and you'll make a mint.

Man Cooking Outside
It's a little early to start eating. Come back in a bit.
Inside the Materia Shop...

Materia Shopkeeper
...We're closed now.

Man Outside Dress Shop
Oh... what should I do... Should I just buy it......?
Inside the dress shop...

Customer
Don't push! Hooligan!

Shopkeeper's Daughter
Welcome. Please take your time.
Back outside again...

Man
All this trash. Can't we do anything with it?

Man 2
All this, belongs to the owner of the Weapons Shop. He keeps picking things up and saving them here.

Man
Oh, you mean the owner who even has a tank in his shop.

Man 2
But no matter how you look at it, it's just trash...
Inside the gym...

Man Using Punching Bag
Join the club.
Try it with us.

Beautiful Bro
Oh dear. I've gained weight again.

Men Doing Squats
All right... 1, 2, 3. Squats are all in the rhythm.
I'm doing my best, bro'!
How's... this!?
Inside the bar...

Clothing Shop Owner
Whew, times are bad.

Redhead
...And then...

Redhead 2
Hmm, hmmm, oh really?

Barkeeper
Yes? If you want to order, do it at the counter.

Man Waiting Outside Bathroom
Hey, could you do somethin' for me? Someone's been in there all day and they're not comin' out. I can't hold it anymore!

Redhead in Bathroom
HEY... someone's IN here... Don't look!
Got any medicine on you? I'm too hyper... and...... ugh......
Inside the weapon shop...

Weapon Shop Owner
You want somethin'? I don't wanna hear any complaints 'bout how things look.
At Don Corneo's mansion...

Doorman
This is the mansion of Don Corneo, the most powerful man in Wall Market.
Look, the Don's not into men. So don't let me catch you around here again...
Hey, and you got another cute one with you!
Aerith and Cloud step aside to talk.

Aerith
Hey, this look's like the Don's mansion. I'll go take a look.
I'll tell Tifa about you.
She starts for the door.

Cloud
No!! You can't!!

Aerith
Why?

Cloud
You DO know... what kind of... place this is, don't you?

Aerith
Then what am I supposed to do? You want to go in with me?

Cloud
Well being a man, that'll be pretty hard. Besides if I bust in there, it'll cause too much commotion.
But, I just can't let you go in alone... Oh, man......
At this point, Aerith starts laughing, but Cloud continues without noticing.

First... we need to find out if Tifa's alright...
What's so funny, Aerith?

Aerith
Cloud, why don't you dress up like a girl? It's the only way.

Cloud
WHAT!?
Aerith runs over to the doorman before he can protest further.

Aerith
Just wait. I've got a cute friend I want to bring.

Cloud
Aerith! I can't......

Aerith
You ARE worried about Tifa, aren't you? Them come on, hurry!

Doorman
A friend, huh...? Sounds pretty good to me.
That'll make the Don happy, too. Who knows, maybe I can...... heeee, hee hee.
Now that they know where Tifa is, it becomes possible to enter the Honey Bee Inn.

Man outside Honey Bee Inn
Nope, I just can't make up my mind. Here, you take this. You won't be able to get in without it.
Received Key Item "Member's Card"

Older Man
Mmm! Please, please!

Redhead in Suit
Hey! Is that a "Member's Card" I see shining in your hot little hand?
Please, come in.

Cloud
...Hmm. That's how you'll fool them.

Aerith
.........Hmmmmmmm. So that's how you fooled them.

Cloud
Let's go!!
Cloud runs inside, leaving Aerith behind. Inside, all the women are dressed in bee costumes.

Lady
Poo, I uh, mean, Sir...
Hurry...
Please choose a room. (Gosh, he's so weird... but then again, they all are.)
The Queen's Room.

Cloud
Looks like this room's being used.
- Take a listen
- Take a peek
There is a wind blowing and ominous thunder.

Cloud
......Wooo... ow!!

......The wind's calm now......
It's the curse of the resurrected Satan... Our beloved Queen does not awaken...
The time is ripe...
A legend has been passed on through generations...

First Speaker
Psst...... (Hey, shouldn't we stop him soon?)

Second Speaker
...whisper... whisper... (We have a luncheon with President Shinra...)

First Speaker
Psst...... (You tell him......)

Second Speaker
Psst...... (I can't tell him......)

First Speaker
Psst...... (Come on!! Oh, well......)
A legend has been passed on through generations...

Second Speaker
Psst...... (I'm so disgusted with the President.)
......the sought after Promised Land......

First Speaker
Psst...... (It's like this every time we have a business trip to Midgar.)
......One with Blue Eyes...

First Speaker
(We come all the way to Midgar, just for this...)
......and a Great White Sword on his back......

Second Speaker
Psst... (What're you complaining about. You're just holding the lights. I've gotta wear this heavy armor!)
......Will not lead to the Promised Land......

First Speaker
Psst...... (I know, I know... but it's all part of the job.)
Psst...... (Oh yeah, did you hear? The President's wife found out about this little hobby of his.)

Second Speaker
Psst...... (Ha, ha...... No way, that's the first I've heard of it.)

First Speaker
Psst...... (Oh, looks like he's done. Man, I'm glad!!)

Second Speaker
Geez!! Mr. President!! I mean, Your Majesty......
There are slapping noises.

Second Speaker
Ohhh...... I'm sorry. Please remove the ancient curse!
The Lover's Room.

Cloud
Looks like this room's being used.
- Take a listen
- Take a peek
There are odd sort of snoring sounds.

Cloud
......Wooo...ow!!

Old Man
...wheez...
Phew...

Old Woman
What's wrong, Grandpa? You keep sighing.

Old Man
...wheez... puff... You know, Grandma...

Old Woman
You talking about this room?

Old Man
...whew... I know our son rented this for us and all, but...
It's too nice for us. Big round bed, gorgeous tub, I just can't get comfortable.

Old Woman
Don't worry about it. It's a high class neighborhood, in the Big City.
You keep complainin' and we'll get in trouble.

Old Man
...wheez...
In the dressing room, three women sit in front of vanity mirrors.

Woman
Hmm, hmm, hmm......
Ohhh, I just can't seem to lose weight. Hmm, hmm, hmm...
Sir!! You can't come in here.
(Yuk...... a pervert...)
Oh my!! (...You're still here? Oh well, good timing anyway.)
Hey, what do you think about me?

Cloud
- Not interested
- Whatever...

Woman
NO WAY! I'M SO SHOCKED!!
Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm...... Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm... Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm...
Phew...... ...it's so tiring.
Oh!!
Is something the matter?

Cloud
- Not yet......
- ......Not really

Woman
OH......!!

Woman
Hmph......!! Listen you, not that it matters, but you sure do know how to make people mad.

Woman
Oh my!! Are you embarrassed? (Man!! Why are you so moody...)

Woman 2
Eyaaah!
Don't watch!!
Eyaaah!
Don't!

Woman 3
Paste, paste, paste...
(Oh God... here's another one of those guys. You know, the delicate type. Just ignore him, just ignore him.)
Fluff, fluff, fluff...
(Hmm...! I guess he doesn't realize his position. I feel sorry for him. Just ignore him, just ignore him.)
Pita, pita, pita...
(God, what a pest! All right, get out of here! You dog...)
(That's it, I'll name him 'pooch'.)
Mix, mix, mix......
(What should I do... Is he following me? Really? What if he follows me home...?)
(Poochy'll do it, I'm sure of it...)
Shake, shake, shake...
(You think he's after me? Really? This guy makes me sick... And his eyes are weird too...)
(Yeah, don't hurt these guys' feelings. Let's at least say 'hi' to him.)
Uhh...... Hel... Hello.
What a nice day, today.

Cloud
- Introduce yourself
- Say Goodbye

By the way, I haven't introduced myself yet.
I'm Cloud, a jack of all trades.

Woman 3
Oh, yeah...? Welcome, Cloud.
(Gross! Don't get carried away, remember your name is 'Pooch!')
Take care... Cloud.

Woman 3
BYE!! (Phew - I'm safe now...)
The &$#% Room.

Cloud
Looks like it's unoccupied.
- I guess I'll take this one
- Hold ground

Cloud
I'll take this room.

Lady
All right. Now all we have to do is enter the room.
You're not going to have a change of heart, are you?

Cloud
- Don't make me repeat myself
- I'm still trying to decide

Lady
Oh, don't be angry with me... (Geez... this one's probably the violent type...)
All right, please.
Cloud enters the room.

Lady
There you are. Enjoy yourself (You moody creepo!)
Inside the room, there's a translucent Cloud crouching in the corner.

Cloud
Hmm......? You......?
What are you doing in a place like this?
Cloud starts clutching his head in pain.

That's what I want to ask you. Should you be foolin' around here?
You think problems will just go away just thinkin' about them?
Cloud collapses.

Lady
Oh no!
Help! Someone...! Hurry!
You can't change anything by just sitting back and looking at it.

Cloud
What are you saying?
It's started moving.

Cloud
What has?
Wake up!

rub, rub, rub... rub, rub, rub, rub...
thump... pound... thump... pound...
poik... poik... ...squish.

Cloud
Uh... OW...!!
Cloud's HP/MP Restored!
Wake up!!
Cloud wakes up to find a mustached man slapping him.

Mukki
Wake up!!
Phew, I'm so relieved.
Bubby!! I heard you collapsed.
No, no, no.
Don't get so uptight.

Cloud
- Huh...?
- Ugh...?

Mukki (he says the same thing regardless)
Hmm...? They say youth is so long but so short.
Let's give this next one your best shot.
He gets up.
Time's up. Bye, bubby.
Cloud gets up.

Mukki
Don't get depressed over a thing like this.
It happens to me all the time.

Lady
I'm so sorry... There's a lot of 'adult' things going on...
For your inconvenience, Please take this, okay?
Received Key Item "Lingerie"!

Cloud
What, this rag? For me!? I just don't get it.
The Group Room.

Cloud
Looks like it's unoccupied.
- I guess I'll take this one
- Hold ground

Cloud
I'll take this room.

Lady
All right. Now all we have to do is enter the room.
You're not going to have a change of heart, are you?

Cloud
- Don't make me repeat myself
- I'm still trying to decide

Lady
Oh, don't be angry with me... (Geez... this one's probably the violent type...)
All right, please.
Cloud enters the room.

Lady
There you are. Enjoy yourself (You moody creepo!)

Lady
This way, please.
Shall we begin?
I guess since you chose this room, that would mean you...
Hate being lonely?

Cloud
- I'm used to being alone
- Cut the small talk
I'm always alone.
I don't want to talk right now.

Lady
All right, all right. (...geez, you're so moody!)
Come on, everyone's waiting.

Cloud
- Everyone...?
- What am I doing?

Lady
Here they are.
All right, everyone.

Men
One, two!! One, two!!
A group of maybe fifteen men runs in.

Men
Yeah!!
One, two!! One, two!!
One, two!! One, two!!

Mukki
Wassup!!
(Smile, smile, smile...)

Cloud
Oh man...
What should I do...?
- I'm outta here.
- This could be dangerous...

I've got no time to mess around with you.
Outta my way!
Looks like I'm always going to be facing crises all my life...

Mukki
...heave... pant...
Don't be so embarrassed! Loosen up, bubby!
...heave... pant...
Let's wash off all our sweat and dirt together!
Wassup!!
The men advance on Cloud, and the camera raises above their heads.

Mukki
You're the intimate type, huh!!
...heave... pant... Wow!! Would ya look at that!
Somehow they all get into the tub, and the camera lowers again.

Mukki
Isn't bathing great...?
It soothes your heart.
How is it, bubby!?
Feels good, huh?

Cloud
- ......
- It hurts
I don't feel good. Let me out...
Too stuffy in here...

Mukki
You'll get used to it. Try counting to ten.

Cloud
Ten...
Nine...

Mukki
Hey bubby, how old are you?

Cloud
Eight...
Twenty one...

Mukki
You're less than half my age. I'm so jealous.
So how 'bout it...?
Do you wanna join my "Young bubby's" group?

Cloud
- Not interested
- ............

Seven...
Six...
Maybe in another life.

Seven...
Six...
Not to be rude or anything, but could you go do someone else?

Mukki
Well, if that's how you feel... too bad.
We have a trip planned at a cabin out in the country.

Cloud
Five...
Four...
Three...
Two...
One...
Alright, that's ten. I'm gettin' out.

Mukki
Why don't you stick around and play a bit?
Daddy's so lonely...
They all get back out of the tub.

Mukki
Bubby!! This is important to me.
Here's a memento of our time together!
Received Key Item "Bikini briefs"!

Mukki
Hope we meet again!
The men all run out.

Cloud
This is SOME underwear... I'm supposed to wear this...?
Well, if it's to save Tifa... I guess there's no way around.

Cloud gets up and shrugs.
If Cloud walks back into the dressing room...

Cloud
If I were to dress up like a woman... Then I've got to really prepare carefully.
Seems like I could put makeup on here.
- Have them put makeup on
- Don't do it

Cloud
I have a favor to ask of you. Can you put makeup on me too?

Woman 3 (turning around to face him)
...paste, paste, paste......
Oh... my......
Cloud leaves the dressing room and exits the Honey Bee Inn. Outside, Aerith is surrounded by the men hanging around, but they scatter when Cloud steps out.

Older Man
Uh, sir!! It's almost closing time...
So, please remember any personal belongings.

Shinra Soldier
Uuuuuuuh! I want flowers too! But, I get so nervous in front of cute girls...
It just seems natural to get cautious...

Aerith
Hey!! Cloud!!
She runs over to join him.

Johnny
Aerith...... Thanks for the flower and 1 gil.
I'll treasure this! I'm going to dry it and keep it for good luck.

Redhead in Suit
I bought some pretty flowers from Aerith.
500 gil, a little expensive. Well, at least I got her name.

Punk
I asked Aerith for a date...
And she said not even if I paid her 1,000,000 gil.
Her flowers cost 300 gil, too... She's a good business woman.
Back on the main quest. Aerith and Cloud head to the dress shop.

Aerith
Excuse me! I'd like to get a dress.

Shopkeeper's Daughter
Umm, it might take a little time. Will that be all right?

Aerith
What's the problem?

Shopkeeper's Daughter
Well, my father, the owner, has been in a slump lately. You see, he makes all the dresses.

Aerith
And, where is your father?

Shopkeeper's Daughter
He's probably plastered at the bar.

Aerith
So... You're saying we can't get a dress unless we do something about your father?

Shopkeeper's Daughter
Yes, I'm sorry. He's caused so much trouble.
!
You'd help me bring him back?

Aerith
Well, if we don't do something, we don't get a dress, right?

Shopkeeper's Daughter
Really!? Please help my crazy old dad. I just don't know what to do anymore...

Aerith
All right, we'll do something. Let's go, Cloud!
On talking to her again:

Shopkeeper's Daughter
So how did it go?

Cloud
We couldn't find him yet.
Heading on over to the bar, they approach a man slouched at the counter.

Aerith
Excuse us, are you the father of the girl at the Clothing Store?

Clothing Shop Owner
I own the Clothes Shop... but I ain't your father.

Aerith
I didn't say that......

Cloud
Make me some clothes.

Clothing Shop Owner
I don't make men's clothes. And I don't feel like makin' anything right now.

Aerith
Cloud, you wait over there for a second. I'll try and talk to him.
Why don't you go over there and have something to drink.
Cloud turns away.

Aerith
You know, Mister.
He always said that just once, he'd like to dress up like a girl.
So, that's why I wanted a cute dress for him...

Clothing Shop Owner
What!? A tough lookin guy like that?

Aerith
So, how 'bout it? Will you make him one?

Clothing Shop Owner
...might be interesting. I was gettin' a little bored just makin' regular clothes.

Aerith
Then you'll do it for us?

Clothing Shop Owner
Yeah, all right. What kind of dress you want?

Aerith
Something...
- That feels clean
- That feels soft
And something...
- shiny
- that shimmers
Depending on her answers, the clothing shop owner makes either a silk or a cotton dress.

Clothing Shop Owner
Hmm, got it. Y'know I got a friend that has the same taste as him. I'll go talk to him.
Hey, hold on. Wait till I get an image in my head. Gulp... ummm, that's good.
Cloud and Aerith return to the dress shop, the owner having preceded them.

Shopkeeper's Daughter
Looks like everything went well. He's been making the dress ever since he came back.

Clothing Shop Owner
Oh, you're here. It's ready. Go try it on.
Received Key Item "Cotton/Silk Dress"!
Cloud goes into the changing room, and after a few moments of shuffling--

Cloud
How...... do you put this on?
Aerith walks over, peers in, and shakes her head.

Cloud
Whoa! What are you doing!

Aerith
It's still not right. A wig! That's what you need!

Clothing Shop Owner
Umm, I thought you might, so I talked to my friend about getting one.
You know the gym? You'll find a lot of people there like you. Go and talk to them.
Cloud comes out of the dressing room in his usual attire.

Cloud
...'like you'? Aerith, what did you tell him?

Aerith
Does it matter? Anyhow, we got a pretty dress!
Off to the gym...

Beautiful Bro
You the one...... Who wants to be cute?

Cloud
Cute?

Aerith
Right.
And about the wig...

Beautiful Bro
Yeah, I heard. But it'll cost ya.

Black Man
Urrrrgh!!!
Big Bro!! The only way you're gonna get cuter is if you can beat Big Bro!!

Other Guys
That's right!
So, you've got to compete with us!

Beautiful Bro
You're right. Let's do squats.
All right! We'll beat you out of this gym!

Cloud
Are you...?

Aerith
THE beautiful Bro?

Beautiful Bro
What? You didn't know? Always running around here sayin' Big Bro' this, Big Bro' that...
Never mind that, come over here.
No, I'll explain the rules.
From the ready position, push [] Button to squat, push X Button to get up, and push O Button to go back to the ready position.
So it's [] Button, X Button, O Button in that order.
Got it?

Cloud
- Don't have it
- Got it

Beautiful Bro
Whoever has the most squats after 30 seconds gets the wig.

Black Man
I'm not going to lose.
Big Bro's wig is MINE!!

Beautiful Bro
Just be quiet...
It's not fair for you to start right away, So, you want some practice?

Cloud
- A little
- Don't need to practice

Beautiful Bro
Now let's begin the real thing. Start!

Beautiful Bro
He had 13 squats and you had 19 squats.
You're really something. Okay, I'm a man of my word, here you are.
Received Key Item "Blonde Wig"!

Black man
Big Bro I'm so mad I'm so so so---mad!
The Beautiful Bro kicks him across the room.

Beautiful Bro
Shut up! Don't cry, just because you lost!

Black Man
Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone!

Beautiful Bro
He had 16 squats and you had 16 squats.
Good job. Here's a hand-me-down.
Received Key Item "Dyed Wig"!

Black Man
Hey, Bro. I... I was supposed to get that.
The Beautiful Bro kicks him across the room.

Beautiful Bro
Shut up! You have no room to talk, tying with a beginner like him!!

Black Man
Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone!

Beautiful Bro
He had 17 squats and you had 13 squats.
Sorry You lose.
Since the old man from the clothing store asked me, I can't keep it from you, so...
Oh, now where did I put it?
All right then.
The black man pulls it out from... somewhere and hands it to Cloud. Beautiful Bro punches him.

Beautiful Bro
Stupid! What kinda place is that to hide it in!?

Black Man
Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone!

Beautiful Bro
Sorry... you should still be able to use it if you disinfect it first.
Received Key Item "Wig"!
Just the wig will do to get Cloud into Don Corneo's mansion, but other supplies make the disguise more convincing, so he and Aerith can continue to wander Wall Market in search of them...

Man Outside Restaurant
Please come in. Here's a free 'Pharmacy Coupon' if you enter now.
Inside the restaurant...

Waitress
Welcome! Sit wherever you like!
There is only one empty seat.

Waitress
Have a seat over here.

Cloud
- Sit down
- Don't sit down

Waitress
Yes, what will you have?

Cloud
Hmm...
- Korean B.B.Q. Plate
- Sushi Plate
- Today's Special

Waitress
One [dish name].

Cook
Comin' up!

Waitress
In this store, you pay first. It'll be 70 Gil.

p.span: If you don't have enough money...

scene.p:
Waitress
Hey! Cancel that last order!
Excuse me! You can't come in here and order things without any money. Come again... when you have money.

p.span: If you do have the money...

scene.p:
Waitress
Thank you. Just a second.
There you go. Enjoy.

Cloud
- .........
- It was all right
- I've had better dog food
Nothing happens unless he says "It was all right." On subsequent visits after obtaining the pharmacy coupon, the waitress will say "Thank you very much" no matter what Cloud tells her.

Waitress
Thank you. Here's an item coupon for the Pharmacy.
You can exchange it for one item there.
We're out of coupons, so we stopped giving them away. Watch out for our NEXT promotion!
Received Key Item "Pharmacy Coupon"!

Tanned Man
Umf... grunt... smack... Don't sneak up on me like that!

Redhead
I'm gonna get another Pharmacy Coupon today.

Dark-haired Man
It's thanks to the Don that we can eat like this.

Person in Blue
I always get the Special.

Man in Hat
umf... scarf... glub...
Cloud leaves the restaurant and heads to the pharmacy. It takes a moment for the shopkeeper to notice him.

Pharmacy Owner
Whoa!
Why don't you say something, if you're standing there?
Oh, you have a coupon. Then please select any one medicine you like.

Cloud
- Disinfectant
- Deodorant
- Digestive
Received Key Item "Disinfectant/Deodorant/Digestive"!
Either the disinfectant or the digestive can yield a more useful item if Cloud heads back to the bar...

Redhead in Bathroom
HEY!! Someone's IN here... Don't look!
What...... urk......

Cloud
- Give her medicine
